entry.title: Tracking you?
entry.content: I don’t and won’t have any idea who visits me. I do not track you. I’m too selfish to share data with Google(by using Analytics), too poor(?) to afford PHP hosting or too lazy to bypass anti-tracking browser extensions and to write a GeoIP cURL method, or to grep -R for someone’s MaxMind paid database(or again poor?) and finally to mindmap people who randomly land here for searching “shogun porn” in a Chinese IE search toolbar.

entry.title: Crypto break
entry.content:
Well, if you’re a social media analyst, you’ll cover Colin Percival’s presentation in 10 minutes.
Download

entry.title: Patience
entry.content: “Patience is the best remedy for every trouble.”
